bug.author: thomasopsomer
bug.summary: Sentences boundaries not serialized / deserialized with custom SBD component
bug.description:
Hi, I'm using a SBD component to access sentences without parsing the document. I just noticed that after serialization, and deserialization I lose the information about sentence boundaries. To reproduce: import spacy
nlp = spacy.load("en", disable=["parser"]) nlp.add_pipe(spacy.pipeline.SentenceSegmenter(nlp)) doc = nlp("First sentence. And a second sentence")
assert len(list(doc.sents)) > 1 # Success
new_doc = spacy.tokens.Doc(nlp.vocab).from_bytes(doc.to_bytes()) assert len(list(new_doc.sents)) > 1 # Fail <denchmark-h:h2>Info about spaCy</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.0.5 Platform: Darwin-16.7.0-x86_64-i386-64bit Python version: 3.6.2 Models: en
